settings.html: This is The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 Mobile Workstation—an exemplary mobile PACS workstation crafted for the precision and efficiency demands of the medical field, particularly suited for radiologists. This workstation combines robust processing power, advanced graphics, and high-speed storage in a sleek, durable package designed to handle the rigors of healthcare environments.

settings.title: Unparalleled Performance
settings.content: This is The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 Mobile Workstation—an exemplary mobile PACS workstation crafted for the precision and efficiency demands of the medical field, particularly suited for radiologists. This workstation combines robust processing power, advanced graphics, and high-speed storage in a sleek, durable package designed to handle the rigors of healthcare environments. The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 is powered by the latest 13th Gen Intel Core processors, including options up to the i9-13950HX, delivering exceptional performance for intensive tasks such as rendering high-resolution medical images and processing large datasets. The combination of powerful CPUs and up to 128GB of high-speed DDR5 RAM ensures seamless multitasking and efficient workflow management.

settings.title: Optimized Viewing for Diagnostic Imaging
settings.content:
The 16:10 aspect ratio of the HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 Mobile Radiology Workstation provides 11% more vertical content than a standard 16:9 display, essential for radiologists who need to view more of the image with less scrolling. This improvement helps maintain diagnostic integrity by ensuring vital details are always visible, reducing the need to minimize program menus or toolbars.

The pixel density on the 16-inch screen with a 16:10 aspect ratio surpasses that of a typical 17-inch screen with a 16:9 aspect ratio, delivering sharper, more detailed images crucial for accurate diagnosis and analysis.

Key Benefits:

  • Enhanced Vertical Space: Shows more vertical content, ideal for detailed diagnostic images.
  • Improved Workflow: Reduces scrolling, allowing radiologists to focus on image analysis.
  • Comprehensive Image Display: Ensures critical details are visible simultaneously.
  • Higher Pixel Density: Offers superior image clarity compared to a 17-inch display, enhancing diagnostic accuracy.

settings.title: Powering Radiology: HP Fury 16 G10 with RTX 5000 Ada 16GB
settings.description: The HP Fury 16 G10, powered by the RTX 5000 Ada 16GB graphics card, is a vital asset for radiologists, providing exceptional performance for demanding medical imaging tasks. With 16GB of GDDR6 memory, it handles complex 3D reconstructions and real-time processing with ease, ensuring precise and timely diagnoses. The RTX 5000 Ada's architecture offers enhanced image clarity and accuracy through advanced ray tracing and AI-powered tools, which are crucial for detecting anomalies and improving workflow efficiency. These features make navigating large datasets and high-resolution scans smoother and more reliable. The combination of high memory capacity, powerful processing, and AI integration makes the HP Fury 16 G10 an ideal choice for radiologists who require top-tier performance and reliability in their medical imaging tasks.

settings.title: Superior Performance with High-Capacity NVMe SSDs
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 Mobile Radiology Workstation provides advanced storage solutions for medical imaging professionals needing high-speed data access and large storage capacities. With a 2TB PCIe NVMe SSD, it offers rapid read and write speeds, significantly faster than traditional SATA SSDs. NVMe SSDs are designed for durability and reliability, ensuring large medical datasets and imaging files are securely stored and quickly accessible. This high-speed storage solution enhances system responsiveness and reduces load times, essential for efficient workflow management in medical environments. This storage capacity allows healthcare professionals to handle large imaging files and extensive medical records seamlessly, ensuring all necessary data is readily available for diagnostic processes.

settings.title: Intel Core i9-13950HX: Speed and Performance for Medical Imaging
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 Mobile Radiology Workstation is equipped with the Intel Core i9-13950HX processor, designed to meet the demanding requirements of medical imaging and diagnostic tasks. This processor features 24 cores and 32 threads, providing robust performance for complex multitasking applications. With a base clock speed of 3.6GHz and the ability to reach up to 5.5GHz with Intel Turbo Boost Technology, it offers exceptional speed and responsiveness. The large 36MB cache enhances processing efficiency by storing frequently accessed data closer to the processor, reducing latency and improving overall system performance. This makes the i9-13950HX ideal for handling intensive imaging tasks, real-time data processing, and advanced diagnostic applications.

settings.title: High-Velocity DDR5 Memory
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 offers versatile memory options to handle demanding multitasking and data-intensive applications typical in medical diagnostics. It supports a maximum capacity of up to 128GB DDR5-5600, with four SODIMM memory slots allowing for customizable configurations. The DDR5-5600 memory ensures rapid data processing and efficient multitasking capabilities. This high-speed memory is crucial for running multiple applications simultaneously and managing large datasets without performance degradation.

settings.title: Built-In Ethernet Port
settings.description: PerfectLum is specifically designed to optimize the HP ZBook Fury 16 G10’s high brightness IPS displays, ensuring compliance with medical imaging standards such as DICOM for grayscale accuracy. Its calibration capabilities extend to maintaining the 100% DCI-P3 color gamut offered by the HP ZBook Fury 16 G10, essential for precise radiological diagnostics.

settings.title: Comprehensive 112-Key Numeric Keypad for Enhanced Data Entry
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 features a full numeric keypad with 112 keys, enhancing productivity and data entry efficiency.

settings.title: Illuminated Backlit Keyboard for Enhanced Visibility in Any Environment
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10’s backlit keyboard ensures comfortable typing in low-light conditions, enhancing productivity and visibility.

settings.title: Practical Spill-Resistant Keyboard for Busy Medical Environments
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10’s spill-resistant keyboard is designed to protect against accidental liquid spills, enhancing durability and reliability.

settings.title: Experience Enhanced Cooling & Portability
settings.description: Equipped with HP Vaporforce Thermals, including a new curved metal blade design, the ZBook Studio 16 G10 ensures efficient cooling, maintaining optimal performance during intensive workloads.

settings.title: Built-In Ethernet Port
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10’s built-in RJ-45 Ethernet port provides reliable Gigabit Ethernet, crucial for radiologists handling large imaging files and patient data.

settings.title: Your title
settings.description: Your description

settings.title: Enhanced Communication and Data Transfer with Bluetooth 5.3
settings.description: The HP Fury 16 G10 offers WiFi 6E and 4G LTE for fast, reliable internet access, ensuring seamless connectivity anytime and anywhere for professionals on the go.

settings.title: HP Context Aware: Intelligent, Adaptive Performance Optimization
settings.description: HP Context Aware provides AI based optimization to maximize performance when you're working at a table, comfort when you're working from your lap, and responsiveness when you're working on the go.

settings.title: Enhanced Communication and Data Transfer with Bluetooth 5.3
settings.description: Bluetooth 5.3 in the HP Fury 16 G10 ensures ultra-low latency, enabling real-time connectivity with medical devices for timely diagnostics and patient care.

settings.title: Experience Enhanced Cooling & Portability
settings.description: Equipped with HP Vaporforce Thermals, including a new curved metal blade design, the ZBook Studio 16 G10 ensures efficient cooling, maintaining optimal performance during intensive workloads.

settings.title: Biometric Fingerprint Reader for Enhanced Data Protection
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 features a Fingerprint Reader, providing secure and convenient biometric authentication.

settings.title: Effortless Travel: Lightweight Solutions for Radiologists
settings.description: Despite its powerful components, the HP Fury 16 G10 workstation is designed to be portable, with a starting weight of just 5.17 lbs (2.35 kg) and a sleek profile.

settings.title: Secure and Convenient Access with Infrared Camera and Windows Hello
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 is equipped with an Infrared Camera that supports Windows Hello login, providing secure and convenient facial recognition for quick access.

settings.title: Experience Enhanced Cooling & Portability
settings.description: Equipped with HP Vaporforce Thermals, including a new curved metal blade design, the ZBook Studio 16 G10 ensures efficient cooling, maintaining optimal performance during intensive workloads.

settings.title: Effortless Travel: Lightweight Solutions for Radiologists
settings.description: Despite its powerful components, the HP Fury 16 G10 workstation is designed to be portable, with a starting weight of just 5.17 lbs (2.35 kg) and a sleek profile.

settings.title: Reliable and Sustained Battery Life for High-Demand Professional Workflows
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 provides 10 hours of battery life under moderate usage and 5 hours under heavy load.

settings.title: Quick-Charge Technology for Minimal Downtime
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 charges to 50% in under 30 minutes, ensuring quick power-ups for busy professionals.

settings.title: Eye-Saving Anti-Glare Display with Low Blue Light for Prolonged Work
settings.description: The HP Fury 16 G10 features a 16-inch anti-glare, matte low blue-light IPS LCD screen with 450 cd/m² brightness, ideal for radiologists viewing detailed images without eye strain.

settings.title: AI Noise Suppression for Clearer Audio and Reduced Distractions
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10’s AI Noise Suppression enhances audio clarity, filtering background noise for clear virtual meetings and telehealth.

settings.title: Advanced Camera Security
settings.content:
The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 is equipped with a high-quality 5MP IR camera that includes advanced auto-framing features, designed to enhance the user experience during virtual meetings and telehealth consultations.

Camera Highlights:

  • 5MP Resolution: Provides high-definition video quality, ensuring clear and detailed images for virtual consultations and collaborative meetings.
  • Auto-Framing: The auto-framing feature uses intelligent software to keep the user centered in the frame. This is particularly useful during dynamic video calls where the user might move around, as the camera automatically adjusts to keep the user in focus.
  • IR Sensor: Supports Windows Hello facial recognition, allowing for secure and quick login without the need for passwords.
  • Privacy Shutter: Includes a physical shutter to cover the camera when not in use, ensuring privacy and security against unauthorized access.

settings.title: AI Noise Suppression
settings.content:
The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 is equipped with AI Noise Suppression technology, a feature designed to enhance audio clarity during virtual meetings and collaborative work sessions. This technology intelligently filters out background noise, ensuring that only clear and focused audio is transmitted, making it ideal for medical professionals who often participate in telehealth consultations, remote diagnostics, and collaborative discussions.

AI Noise Suppression Highlights:

  • Clear Communication: Enhances voice clarity by reducing background noise, ensuring clear and professional communication in virtual meetings.
  • Productivity Boost: Helps maintain focus and productivity by minimizing audio distractions in busy or noisy environments.
  • Integration: Seamlessly integrates with commonly used communication platforms, ensuring consistent audio quality across various applications.

This feature is particularly beneficial for medical imaging professionals who need to communicate complex information accurately and clearly without the interference of background noise, thus improving the overall quality of virtual consultations and remote diagnostics.

settings.title: Advanced Camera Security
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 features a high-quality 5MP IR camera with advanced auto-framing, enhancing the user experience during virtual meetings and telehealth consultations. The 5MP resolution ensures high-definition video quality, providing clear and detailed images for virtual consultations and collaborative meetings. The auto-framing feature uses intelligent software to keep the user centered in the frame, automatically adjusting during dynamic video calls. The IR sensor supports Windows Hello facial recognition for secure and quick login without passwords. Additionally, a physical privacy shutter covers the camera when not in use, ensuring privacy and security against unauthorized access.

settings.title: AI Noise Suppression
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 features AI Noise Suppression technology to enhance audio clarity during virtual meetings and collaborative work sessions. This technology filters out background noise, ensuring clear audio transmission, ideal for telehealth consultations, remote diagnostics, and collaborative discussions. It enhances voice clarity, reduces distractions, and integrates with common communication platforms, ensuring consistent audio quality. This is particularly beneficial for medical imaging professionals who need to communicate complex information accurately and clearly, improving the quality of virtual consultations and remote diagnostics.

settings.title: Anti-Glare Display with Low Blue Light
settings.description: The HP Fury 16 G10 is equipped with a spacious 16-inch anti-glare IPS LCD screen that boasts a matte finish and low blue light emission. With an impressive brightness level of 450 cd/m², this display is specifically designed to provide exceptional clarity and detail, making it an ideal choice for radiologists and other professionals who need to view intricate images and data for extended periods without experiencing eye strain.

settings.title: Ports
settings.description:
With Thunderbolt™ 4 and USB4™ Type-C® connectivity, the HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 offers versatile linking options to various medical imaging equipment, enhancing its utility in diverse medical settings.
01. Power Connector
02. Thunderbolt™ 4 with USB4™ Type-C® 40Gbps signaling
03. Thunderbolt™ 4 with USB4™ Type-C® 40Gbps signaling
04. mDP port
05. HDMI port
06. microSD 7.1 media card reader
07. SmartCard Reader
08. Headphone/Microphone Combo
09. Super Speed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate (charging)
10. Super Speed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate (charging)
11. RJ45
12. Nano Security Lock Slot

It enhances voice clarity, reduces distractions, and integrates with common communication platforms, ensuring consistent audio quality. This is particularly beneficial for medical imaging professionals who need to communicate complex information accurately and clearly, improving the quality of virtual consultations and remote diagnostics.

settings.title: Dimensions & Weight
settings.description:
The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 seamlessly integrates a sleek, modern design with exceptional build quality, making it an optimal choice for medical professionals. It balances high performance with portability, ensuring that users benefit from a powerful and reliable machine that is also easy to transport. This combination of aesthetics, durability, and functionality caters to the demanding needs of healthcare professionals who require a dependable and efficient tool for their work.

Dimensions and Weight Highlights:

  1. Height: 1.12" (286 mm)
  2. Width: 14.29" (363 mm)
  3. Depth: 9.86" (250 mm)


Weight: 5.17 lbs (2.35 kg)

settings.title: Dimensions & Weight
settings.content:
The HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 combines a sleek design with robust build quality, making it an ideal choice for medical professionals who need both performance and portability.

Dimensions and Weight Highlights:

  • Dimensions (W x D x H): 36.3 x 25 x 2.8 cm (14.29 x 9.86 x 1.12 inches)

settings.title: Exceptional Service & Support from Monitors.com
settings.content:

Competitive Pricing: At Monitors.com, we're committed to delivering exceptional value. You'll find our products competitively priced to fit comfortably within your budget.

Customer Satisfaction: Your contentment is our top priority, and we're dedicated to ensuring you're thrilled with your purchase. We're here to assist you at every step.

Invest in a Monitors.com workstation for not just top-tier hardware but a partnership committed to your success.
